solution_line_template: The savory soufflés need {eggs_per_savory_souffle} eggs each and she wants to make {num_savory_souffles} of these so she needs {eggs_per_savory_souffle}*{num_savory_souffles} = <<{eggs_per_savory_souffle}*{num_savory_souffles}={eggs_for_savory}>>{eggs_for_savory} eggs

The dessert soufflés need {eggs_per_dessert_souffle} eggs each and she wants to make {num_dessert_souffles} of these so she needs {eggs_per_dessert_souffle}*{num_dessert_souffles} = <<{eggs_per_dessert_souffle}*{num_dessert_souffles}={eggs_for_dessert}>>{eggs_for_dessert} eggs
For the dinner party she will need {eggs_for_savory}+{eggs_for_dessert} = <<{eggs_for_savory}+{eggs_for_dessert}={total_eggs_needed}>>{total_eggs_needed} eggs in total
